oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Symphony Orchestra, First Season, 1920 November 07
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A concert program of the Nashville Symphony Orchestra’s Season of 1920-21, the first concert of the season, with F. Arthur Henkel, Conductor, performed at the Ryman Auditorium, November 7th, 1920. Includes several local advertisers: Ward-Belmont Conservatory of Music; Claude P. Street Piano Company; and others. Forms part of the Nashville Symphony Orchestra Collection. 1 program.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Henkel, Frederick Arthur, 1880-
